rules.description: Hyper cursor keys in home position (based on qwerty)

manipulators.description: Colemak hyper-period to mouse right click
Colemak command hyper-l to shift home
Colemak command hyper-u to shift-up arrow

rules.description: F16 to hyper-[ for window arrangement
F19 to hyper-] for window arrangement
SSMS on Jump to Rider mapping
Cmd-shift > to F# forward pipe operator (|>)
Cmd-shift - to F# forward arrow operator (->)
Right control to option to make magic keyboard same as mac when skipping words with cursor keys (except Jump desktop)
Home to Command-Left arrow to go to beginning of line (except Jump desktop)
End to Command-Right arrow to go to end of line (except Jump desktop)
Shift-Home to Shift-Command-Left Arrow to mark up to beginning of line (except Jump desktop)
Shift-End to Shift-Command-Right Arrow to mark up to end of line (except Jump desktop)
